mapper.insert: insert into product (product_category, product_name, product_date, product_price, product_quantity) values (#{productCategory}, #{productName}, #{productDate}, #{productPrice}, #{productQuantity})
mapper.update: update product set product_category = #{productCategory}, product_name = #{productName}, product_date = #{productDate}, product_price = #{productPrice}, product_quantity = #{productQuantity} where product_no = #{productNo}
